alert.note: Alert for Saratoga; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 2:17AM EST until December 20 at 5:48PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Fort Edward. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Water floods River Road in Northumberland and reaches camps in Lake Luzerne. It may also result in flooding in Stillwater. Water is over the concrete wall at the Fort Edward Yacht Basin and several homes nearby have water approaching them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 26.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 27.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Fort Edward Flood Stage: 26.0 Observed Stage at Tue 1 am: 26.9 Forecast: Tue 7 am 27.2 Tue 1 pm 27.3 Tue 7 pm 27.2 Wed 1 am 27.0 Wed 7 am 26.4 Wed 1 pm 25.9 Wed 7 pm 25.5 Thu 1 am 25.1 Thu 7 am 24.8 Thu 1 pm 24.5 Thu 7 pm 24.2 &&
